name: modifiers
description: Base game modifiers available across all game elements

values.description: [icon:UNIT_BUCCANEER] Buccaneers gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Looting Promotion for free.
+2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
You have no maximum Range on [icon:TRADE_ROUTE]Trade Routes.
+1% total [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +2% if the [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+1% total [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +2% if the [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+5%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings for every [icon:CITYSTATE]Scientific City-State you are Suzerain of.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on displayed [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.
[icon:UNIT_BUCCANEER] Buccaneers gain 1 charge to create a new [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortifications in Settlements with at least 1 Garrisoned Unit.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSIONIST] Expansionist Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+30% Commander Experience. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Fleets and Armies.
Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most Factories.
-10 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at [icon:WAR] War.
[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Settlements with a stationed Commander are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Major Outbreaks.
-75%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:TOWN_FOCUS] Specialization.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Land Units in your own territory.
Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most captured Settlements.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands. Units gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Homelands.
+4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Minor Outbreaks.

+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. These Settlements gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected.

+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements that follow your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. These Settlements gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.
Training a Naval Unit grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the Unit's base [icon:YIELD_Production] Production cost.
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Infantry and Ranged Units.
+15 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units against [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys.
When you capture a [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoy Unit, it is worth an additional Treasure Fleet Point.
Land Military Units fight as though they were at full [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength even when damaged.
+1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Civilian Units. +1 charge for [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries.

[icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging Improvements grants [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in all [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns equal to 50% of the yield or [icon:Action_Heal] HP gained. -3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

Decrease [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with Leaders of the opposing [icon:NOTIFICATION_IDEOLOGY_CHOSEN] Ideology with the most completed [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech and [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Masteries.
+4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_CULTURAL] Cultural Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings on Coast or Navigable Rivers.
-4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in each Settlement without a Garrisoned Unit.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities and -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Units for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you ahve.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Siege and Infantry Units.
+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Altars in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements but -10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Altars.
+5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Altars in [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected Settlements but -10 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Altars.

+4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital, +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in other Settlements.
When you convert a Settlement you own, gain a [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant and damage 3 [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in that Settlement.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains. +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonders.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities per [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HOSTILE] Hostile Relationship. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Military Units.
[icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in Coastal Settlements with a Dungeon are not damaged by [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Major Outbreaks.
+2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.
-4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in all Settlements following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors if you have the least amount of Settlements, +20% otherwise.
[icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_MILITARISTIC] Militaristic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Units. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Armies and Fleets.

When you defeat a Support Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost. When you defeat a Naval Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in Homelands. +10 Range for all [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes.
Gain 1 [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
Gain 1 [icon:UNIT_MIGRANT] Migrant when a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is [icon:YIELD_PLAGUE] Infected but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training all Military Units, but +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for all Units.
[icon:UNIT_HOPLITE] Hoplites gain +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
The [icon:UNIT_PEDANDA] Pedanda grants an extra 25 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture when it converts a Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on the Palace and Wonders.
[icon:UNIT_MEDJAY] Medjay generate +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold when stationed in a Settlement you own.
A boost for a non-Civilization-unique starting [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic in the next age.
A boost for a starting [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Tech in the next Age.
+3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength for Ranged and Siege Units.
[icon:UNIT_FLEET_COMMANDER] Fleet Commanders gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Flotilla Promotion for free.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Heavy Naval Units.
+2 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Military Land Units, [icon:UNIT_SETTLER] Settlers, [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries, and [icon:UNIT_CONQUISTADOR] Conquistadors when Embarked.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Terrace Farms in Settlements with a Granary.
+3 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms and Terrace Farms if adjacent to at least 1 Mountain.
Units adjacent to the [icon:UNIT_PURABHETTARAH] Purabhettarah gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
Cavalry Units gain +50% [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Flanking.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units when defending against Ranged Units.
The [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital receives 2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology Mastery.
[icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging grants experience to friendly [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders when within their [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.
+50% yields and healing from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.
+50% yields and healing from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements.
+50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:MILITARY] Military and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Buildings.
+50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:MILITARY] Military and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Buildings.
After researching a [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology, gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 10% of its cost.
After studying a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 10% of its cost.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units during [icon:WAR] Formal Wars, doubled in territory you own.
The Altar gains +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science if placed on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Vegetated Terrain.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in Settlements with a Port.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings gain a +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency from [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tropical Terrain.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:SOCIAL_POLICY] Social Policy slotted in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
Captured [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns do not cost double to convert into [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for the [icon:UNIT_CHEVALER] Chevaler for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted in the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.
+15% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a [icon:YIELD_TOWNS]Town to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +30% in Distant Lands.
[icon:UNIT_MANDARIN] Mandarins gain +25 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science when they use the Create a Road Action.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Farms, doubled during a [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration.
[icon:Action_Pillage] Coastal Raiding grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% the [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold gained.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for active [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors, [icon:SANCTIONS] Sanctions, and [icon:PROJECT] Projects you started or supported.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Infantry and Naval Units when adjacent to Coast.
The [icon:UNIT_LEGATUS] Legatus gains the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Bulwark Promotion for free.
A boost for a non-Civilization unique starting [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic in the next Age.
A boost for a starting [icon:RADIAL_TECH] Technology in the next Age.
+3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength for Ranged and Siege Units.
You can purchase [icon:WONDER] Wonders with [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold.

Unlocks the [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Gift Gurkha Action which grants a Gurkha Unit to another Civilization. Nepal receives a +10 [icon:RELATIONSHIP] Relationship with them and 5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture (Scales by Gamespeed) for the current Relationship Level with them. Can only be done with [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_FRIENDLY] Friendly or [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HELPFUL] Helpful Civilizations.
[icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders immediately gain a [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level. New [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders start with one [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level.
+2 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Military Units for each adjacent friendly Military Unit.
Gain 1 free [icon:UNIT_NOYAN] Noyan in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.
Minor Rivers do not end Unit [icon:Action_Move] Movement.
The [icon:UNIT_DHOW] Dhow gets +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement and ignores Zone of Control.
[icon:UNIT_FLEET_COMMANDER] Fleet Commanders gain the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Convoys Promotion for free.
Minor and Navigable Rivers do not end Unit [icon:Action_Move] Movement.
Your [icon:UNIT_TRADE_SHIP] Trade Ships cannot be [icon:Action_Pillage] Plundered on Navigable Rivers.
Víkingr may [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillage and Coastal Raid for 1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement when in Distant Lands. Does not apply to Discoveries.
Naval Units can [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillage and Coastal Raid within 2 tiles.
Units complete [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortifications in 1 turn if adjacent to a [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain.
All [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts adjacent to [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains receive [icon:Action_Fortify] Defensive Fortifications, one time effect. Follows normal Walls placement rules.
The [icon:UNIT_KAHUNA] Kahuna gains a second [icon:Action_Heal] Healing charge.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from active [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions you started or supported.
+2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food from [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources assigned to [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units on or adjacent to Coast.
[icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in Homelands on Navigable Rivers generate [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys worth 2 Treasure Fleet points each.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for the [icon:UNIT_GOLD_BANGLES] Gold Bangles Infantry when there are at least 10 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources assigned to the same Settlement.
+100% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards the initiating and supporting the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project, if the [icon:INDEPENDENT_POWER] Independent Power is in Distant Lands.
+20% [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities not founded by you.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength to [icon:UNIT_MAGARRU] Magarru if they are in a [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Þingstaðr in Settlements with a Kiln.
Gain a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relic every time you study a [icon:RADIAL_CIVICS] Civic Mastery.
Receive a free [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route from a new [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State when you become their Suzerain.
Gain a free [icon:UNIT_LEGION] Legion in new Settlements that you found.
+25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.
+10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Naval Units outside friendly territory.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every time a Storm, Flood, or Volcanic Eruption has provided Fertility this Age.
When you defeat an enemy Unit with a [icon:UNIT_LEIOMANO] Leiomano, gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the defeated Unit's [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.
+6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Chang Beun in or adjacent to territory of [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States you are Suzerain of.
+3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on the Palace for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.
+10% to all yields in Settlements not founded by you.
[icon:UNIT_MAMLUK] Mamluks gain the Skirmish ability, +50% [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength from Flanking.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in Settlements with a Temple.

+9[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building's location. Grants a free [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Level to new [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commanders trained in this Settlement.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings gain a +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency with [icon:CITY_RURAL] Hawilti.

Explorers can use the Excavate [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifacts action on or adjacent to [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonders. Each player can do this once per Natural Wonder.
Explorers can Research [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifacts buried since the Antiquity Age. Gain a free [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifact when Researching Artifacts.
Explorers can Research [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Artifacts buried since the Exploration Age.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Ranged and Siege Units.
+50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating the [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Improve Trade Relations Action.
[icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Rough Terrain does not end [icon:Action_Move] Movement for [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys and [icon:UNIT_CONQUISTADOR] Conquistadors.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Land Military Units for every 2 Settlements under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on the Ming Great Wall in Settlements with a Bank.
+3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength to Ranged Units adjacent to the [icon:UNIT_XUNLEICHONG] Xunleichong.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every Civilization Relationship above [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_FRIENDLY] Friendly status.
+2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every Civilization Relationship above [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_FRIENDLY] Friendly status.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Lakes and Navigable Rivers.
[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings gain a +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Coast.
+5 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength for Naval Units against Land Units.
+1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters adjacent to Lakes and Navigable Rivers.
Settlements adjacent to Lakes gain +1 [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population.
All Civilian and Support Units may enter deep Ocean Terrain.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for Lo’I Kalo Improvements in Settlements with a Pavilion.
+1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in Settlements adjacent to Coast.
Unlock an additional [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration effect, +50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating all [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions for 10 Turns.
Unlock an additional [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration effect, +40% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units for 10 Turns.
Unlock an additional [icon:CELEBRATION] Celebration effect, +30% [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for 10 Turns.
[icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in Homelands with 3 Worked Mountains generate [icon:UNIT_TREASURE_FLEET] Treasure Convoys worth 2 Treasure Fleet points each.
[icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Rough Terrain does not end the [icon:Action_Move] Movement of any Inca Unit.
The [icon:UNIT_WARAKAQ] Warak'aq gains the Poison ability, +3 [icon:Action_Ranged] Combat Strength against [icon:DAMAGED] Wounded Units.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Units in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Railroad.

+1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Marine Terrain in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns following your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion. This is doubled for [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings receive an Adjacency from [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains.
Allows all standard Land Units to traverse Coast Terrain.
Allows all standard Land Units to traverse Coast Terrain.
+1% total [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City, or +2% if the [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City is in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
Your Units are immune to damage from blizzards. Enemy Units in your territory take double damage from blizzards.
Your Units are immune to damage from blizzards. Enemy Units in your territory take double damage from blizzards.
The Pairidaeza gains +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from adjacent [icon:CITY_URBAN] Quarters.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Farms in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns in Tundra.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Farms in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra Terrain.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units when you have at least 5 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Relics on display.

[icon:UNIT_SHERPA] Sherpas can activate on a [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tile within 5 tiles of one of your Settlements' Palace or City Hall once every 5 turns. A path of tiles is claimed back to the Settlement and the [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tile is [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improved immediately with a Highland Power Station.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Naval Units at full health.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on the Caravanserai in Settlements with a Bazaar and in Mining Towns and Trade Outposts.
+1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement and [icon:Action_Showall] Sight for the [icon:UNIT_NUMIDIAN_CAVALRY] Numidian Cavalry.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex slot in City Halls in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with the [icon:TOWN_FOCUS] Trade Outpost Focus.
[icon:UNIT_ANTIQUARIAN] Antiquaries can enter other Civilizations’ borders without Open Borders.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units if you have positive or 0 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold per turn at the start of the turn.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every active [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Action with another Leader.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every active [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Action with another Leader.
+5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route with another Civilization.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources assigned to [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
When you support an [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavor, gain 200 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and the other Leader gains 100 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. (On Standard Speed)
+25%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Naval and Aircraft Units.

All Tier 2 and Tier 3 Naval Units can use the Automate Exploration Action.
All Naval Units can safely travel across deep Ocean Terrain without taking [icon:DAMAGED] damage.
All Civilian and Support Units can safely travel across deep Ocean Terrain without taking [icon:DAMAGED] damage.
All Units ignore [icon:Action_Move] Movement penalties from deep Ocean Terrain.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations.
Trade Units can enter deep Ocean Terrain. Settlements across deep Ocean can now serve as origin Settlements for [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes.

+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits and Quarries.
All Naval Units may enter deep Ocean Terrain.
All Embarked Land Units may enter deep Ocean Terrain.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units for every Civilization and City-State you have a [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route with.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Water Puppet Theaters in Settlements with a Gristmill.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands. Units gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Homelands.
+2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Hidden Fortresses for each adjacent Mountain tile.
Gain a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Codex whenever you capture a Settlement for the first time.
+5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Military Units while defending in [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tropical Terrain.
+10 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every Settlement under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.
+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength and +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Naval and Embarked Units.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders.
Infantry and Cavalry Units gain +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when adjacent to each other.

+3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units when more than one enemy Unit is adjacent to them.
+25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units when fighting a [icon:WAR] War in which your [icon:WAR_SUPPORT] War Support is higher than your opponent.

Whenever you train a Prospector or Marine, receive an additional one.

The [icon:UNIT_NU] Chu-Ko-Nu gains +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength when defending.
[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings gain a +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters.
+25% [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities connected with the Staatseisenbahn.
You may establish and retain [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes with Civilizations that you are at [icon:WAR] War with.
[icon:UNIT_OTTRU] Ottru gains the [icon:NAR_REW_PROMOTION] Convoys Promotion for free.
